title: Ranked Play Troll Protection
body:
Hi Everyone,

After a few games where someone gets a lane they don't want and try to forcefully acquire another players role I believe it would be a good idea to add a feature where if 4/5 of the team nominate the game as trolled the game is forfeited before loading or some other method?
The accused will be reported and punished if repeated.
This could be an effective work around to weed out corrosive members in the community with the right tweaking etc??

Thoughts?

replies.body:
I don't know about other regions, but definitely I've seen this posted a few times on OCE, so we at least know it's relatively popular here :D 

I actually like the idea quite a bit TBH, but only if you put some restraints on it to prevent abuse:

+ Not available for 3 or 4 man teams.

+ Each player only gets 1 or 2 remakes every 10 games (to make people think twice about remaking games that just have bad players or off meta champs) 

The one major issue is that if the troll has a duo queue partner with him he can't be stopped. Although to be honest, this is probably a fairly rare scenario.

Get commenting people, lets make something happen about this!
Its happened to us all before and we need to get riot to see whats going on and do something about it!
With many small voices saying the same thing its only a matter of time until they look down at the noise and do something about it!!
